name: Hopparoo
description:
Story

Poor little animals trying to reach their goals. Don't you want to help them? 

Controls

Tapping does everything. Hold to make your animal fly forward.

How to Play

The player is trying to properly remove the character from the stair. The goal is to reach the end of the stairs and finish the steps. If the character presses the edge of the stairs, it loses. The steps start to contract as the player progresses and the game gets harder. There are also steps with different features. The player should pay attention to these.

Goals

Your main goal is to climbing that stair. Make us proud.

Other Information

This short game made for Game 202 Course's midterm assignment.

Credits

UI Artist = İlayda Pınarbaşı

Lead Artist = Ece Karabacak

All Other Stuff = Selami Safa Balık
